Vibhangappakarana：One of the seven books of the Abhidhamma-Pitaka； it is generally placed second in the list （E．g．Mil．12）．It deals in a general way with the different categories and formulas given in the Dhammasanganī，though different methods of treatment are used．The book is divided into eighteen chapters，each of which is called a Vibhanga．Each chapter has three portions：Suttantabhājaniya，Abhidhammabhājaniya and Paññāpucchaka or list of questions．The Commentary to the Vibhanga is called Sammohavinodanī
